attributes.action: Cancel all Members of Parliament “Perks” (subsidised meals, second home,etc)
attributes.additional_details: In this time when everyone is fighting for pay rises and losing terms and conditions to get them MPs are getting pay rises and losing nothing. Charging the NHS to park but getting free parking themselves, subsidised meals, travel expenses, second home allowance and many more. Normal people have to deal with all this within their salary. So should they.
attributes.background: Cancel all MPs perks and make their salary performance and attendance related.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. The Independent Parliamentary Standards Authority (IPSA) is responsible for deciding on MPs' expenses and pay. IPSA is independent of both Parliament and Government.

You can find out more about IPSA here: http://www.theipsa.org.uk
